concept.title: What is addition
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is addition.

conbody.p: Addition is the process of calculating the total of two or more numbers. The total of two or more numbers is known as the sum. The symbol (+) represents the addition function.
Example: If we add 10 and 3, (10 + 3) we get the sum to be 13. Here, we performed the addition operation of the numbers 10 and 3 to get the sum (13).
Addition is used to find the sum total of your shopping at the grocery store.
